errors.error404Description: দুঃখিত, আপনি যে পৃষ্ঠাটি খুঁজছেন তা আমরা খুঁজে পাইনি। এটি সরানো বা মুছে ফেলা হতে পারে।
errors.error500Description: ওহ! আমাদের পক্ষ থেকে কিছু ভুল হয়েছে। আমরা এটি ঠিক করার জন্য কাজ করছি।
errors.errorGenericDescription: একটি অপ্রত্যাশিত ত্রুটি ঘটেছে। অনুগ্রহ করে আবার চেষ্টা করুন বা সমস্যা অব্যাহত থাকলে সহায়তার সাথে যোগাযোগ করুন।

hero.title: Solutions by Industry
hero.subtitle: Purpose-built workflows for every type of live entertainment production

concerts.title: Concerts & Touring
concerts.description: Streamline routing, budgeting, logistics, and crew management across global tour operations — from small venue runs to arena-scale productions.

festivals.title: Music & Art Festivals
festivals.description: Centralize workflows for multi-day, multi-stage events — uniting production, talent, vendors, and compliance under one command system.

immersive.title: Immersive & Experiential Events
immersive.description: Design and operate interactive worlds, installations, and branded experiences with full visibility from creative development to live execution.

theatrical.title: Theatrical & Live Productions
theatrical.description: Manage creative teams, technical schedules, and production assets for stage and performance-based entertainment.

filmTv.title: Film, TV & Media
filmTv.description: Coordinate pre-production, on-set operations, and wrap reporting with tools built for cross-departmental sync and financial transparency.

brandActivations.title: Brand Activations & Marketing Campaigns
brandActivations.description: Execute pop-ups, launches, and campaign-driven experiences — integrating creative, logistics, and ROI tracking into one intelligent dashboard.

corporate.title: Corporate & Private Events
corporate.description: Deliver flawless experiences for internal meetings, retreats, and high-profile gatherings with streamlined planning and vendor coordination.

tradeShows.title: Trade Shows & Conventions
tradeShows.description: Simplify booth builds, exhibitor logistics, and sponsor relations with end-to-end project management and real-time analytics.

wellness.title: Health, Wellness & Lifestyle
wellness.description: Optimize programming, staffing, and guest flow for retreats, fitness events, and wellness experiences — where detail and atmosphere matter most.

hero.headline: The Project Management System for
hero.subheadline: Unify your projects, workforce, assets, and finances in one powerful platform designed specifically for experiential entertainment production.
hero.supportingCopy: From festivals to corporate events, concerts to immersive experiences—ATLVS gives production teams the clarity, control, and collaboration they need to deliver unforgettable moments.
hero.trustIndicators: No credit card required • 14-day free trial • Cancel anytime

problem.title: The Production Management Challenge
problem.subtitle: Managing live entertainment production is complex
problem.pain1Description: Teams juggle spreadsheets, emails, and multiple disconnected platforms
problem.pain2Description: Critical details slip through the cracks during handoffs and transitions
problem.pain3Description: Without real-time visibility, costs spiral out of control
problem.pain4Description: Vendors, crew, and stakeholders struggle to stay aligned

solution.title: One Platform. Complete Control.
solution.subtitle: ATLVS brings everything together
solution.feature1Description: All your projects, teams, and resources in one place
solution.feature2Description: Everyone stays in sync with live updates and notifications
solution.feature3Description: Track budgets, expenses, and invoices with precision

howItWorks.title: How It Works
howItWorks.subtitle: Get started in minutes, not months
howItWorks.step1Description: Set up your company structure and invite your team
howItWorks.step3Description: Give team members the right access and responsibilities
howItWorks.step4Description: Monitor progress, manage budgets, and execute flawlessly

features.title: Everything You Need to Produce at Scale
features.subtitle: Six integrated hubs for complete production management

production.title: Production Hub
production.description: Manage projects, events, people, assets, locations, and files

business.title: Business Hub
business.description: Handle companies, jobs, procurement, and finances

network.title: Network Hub
network.description: Build community, marketplace, and resource library

automations.title: Automations Hub
automations.description: Automate workflows, triggers, and repetitive tasks

system.title: System Hub
system.description: Configure admin, settings, and user profiles

roles.title: Built for Every Role on Your Team
roles.subtitle: 11 branded roles with precise permissions

legend.title: Legend
legend.description: Platform Super Admin - Full control across all organizations

phantom.title: Phantom
phantom.description: Organization Super Admin - Manage your entire organization

aviator.title: Aviator
aviator.description: Strategic Leader - Oversee multiple projects and reporting

gladiator.title: Gladiator
gladiator.description: Project Manager - Full project control and team assignment

navigator.title: Navigator
navigator.description: Department Manager - Manage your department or area

deviator.title: Deviator
deviator.description: Team Lead - Lead your team and assign tasks

visitor.title: Visitor
visitor.description: Temporary Access - Custom permissions with expiration

security.title: Enterprise-Grade Security
security.subtitle: Your data is protected at every level
security.feature1Description: 801 RLS policies ensure users only see what they should
security.feature3Description: All data encrypted at rest and in transit
security.feature4Description: Complete audit trail of all system activity
security.feature6Description: Full compliance with data privacy regulations

testimonials.title: Trusted by Production Teams Worldwide
testimonials.subtitle: See what our customers have to say
testimonials.testimonial1Quote: ATLVS transformed how we manage our festivals. Everything in one place, everyone on the same page.
testimonials.testimonial2Quote: The RBAC system is perfect for our complex org structure. Finally, proper access control for production.
testimonials.testimonial2Title: VP of Operations, Live Events Company
testimonials.testimonial3Quote: We cut our budget overruns by 40% in the first quarter. The financial visibility is game-changing.

pricing.title: Transparent Pricing That Scales With You
pricing.subtitle: From solo contractors to enterprise producers

starter.name: Starter
starter.description: Perfect for freelancers and small teams

faq.title: Frequently Asked Questions
faq.subtitle: Everything you need to know
faq.q1: How long is the free trial?
faq.a1: 14 days, no credit card required. Full access to all features.
faq.a2: Yes, cancel anytime. No long-term contracts or commitments.
faq.q3: What payment methods do you accept?
faq.a3: We accept all major credit cards, ACH, and wire transfers for enterprise plans.
faq.a4: Yes. Enterprise-grade encryption, SOC 2 compliant, GDPR ready. Your data is protected at every level.
faq.a5: Yes. Self-service resources for all plans, plus dedicated training for Enterprise customers.
faq.q6: Can I import my existing data?
faq.a6: Yes. We provide CSV import tools and can assist with custom data migrations for Enterprise plans.
